name: Canyon Race
description:
Canyon Race is an amazing on road & off-road race game with three different game modes, nine awesome tracks, and thrilling championship!

It's this simple: start game, choose your car, truck or bus and develop your racing skills to finish all races in first place! (the bus is pretty cool, actually, it drives well even when off roading!)

Game Features:

- Free to Play!
- Three Game Modes: Arcade, Time Trial and Championship
- Nine Amazing Tracks (combining off road racing and asphalt)!
- Championship Mode: Compete against other drivers to see if you can place in the top 3!
- Many Different Cars, Trucks & Even a Bus To Choose From!
- Upgraded Graphics and Music
- Easy Game Control, But Not Too Easy!
- Smooth Game Play, Incredibly Challenging

The challenge is that a lot of times you can be winning a race, but other drivers will try to FISH TAIL your back bumper and send you into a spin! Be careful, and make sure you don't fall off a cliff on one of the tracks!

Once your driving skills improve, try to see if you can unlock all of the on road and off road race tracks. It may take a few tries, but you'll be addicted to the game by the time you start making progress and winning races (or at least placing in the top 3).
